summary: Empowered by the love of a slave (Jang), a royal concubine (Cheung) is given the chance to make an extraordinary decision.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Hiroyuki Sanada|Cecilia Cheung|Nicholas Tse|Ye Liu|Hong Chen|Qian Cheng|Calvin Yu|Chun-Xiao|Xiaotong Guan|Shi Lei|Peng Lu|Toby Leonard Moore|Qian Po|Anthony Brandon Wong
title: La promesa: la leyenda de los caballeros del viento
